title: Blended Learning Design in Nursing Education: A UDL-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical clinical experience
context.additional_context: A course for current professionals emphasizing flexible learning schedules and field-applicable content. Implements a blended learning environment combining self-directed learning via personal devices with offline workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can apply blended learning strategies based on UDL principles to nursing education settings.
Learners can design and implement methods to enhance nursing practice competencies through mobile microlearning.
Learners present the development and implementation process of blended learning models through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
